showMarkup

public static void showMarkup(GuiBoard guiBoard,
                              ConstNode node)
Shows markup on board. Existing markup is not cleared (but may be overwritten.

showMoves

public static void showMoves(GuiBoard guiBoard,
                             ConstPointList childrenMoves)
Show a list of moves with labels 'A', 'B', 'C' ... If the list contains more than 26 unique moves, the label '*' is used. If a move appears more than once in the list, the character '>' will be appended to the label.

showPointList

public static void showPointList(GuiBoard guiBoard,
                                 ConstPointList points)

showPointStringList

public static void showPointStringList(GuiBoard guiBoard,
                                       ConstPointList pointList,
                                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> stringList)

showVariation

public static void showVariation(GuiBoard guiBoard,
                                 Move[] variation)
Shows moves in variation as stones with move number labels on board. If there are several moves on the same point then the only first move is shown for short variations (less/equal ten moves); and only the last move for long variations.

updateFromGoBoard

public static void updateFromGoBoard(GuiBoard guiBoard,
                                     ConstBoard board,
                                     boolean markLastMove,
                                     boolean showMoveNumbers)
